articles.description: Craig Bellamy says he is proud of his team despite his first defeat as Wales head coach.
articles.title: Craig Bellamy: How you lose is more important - Wales boss after World Cup defeat in Belgium

articles.description: Would Thomas Frank, who has likened managing in the Premier League to being head chef in a high-end restaurant, serve up success at Tottenham?
articles.title: 'Opposite of Postecoglou' - what could Spurs expect from 'chef' Frank?

articles.description: Thomas Tuchel wants his England team to play as they train when they face Senegal - with smiles on their faces and no thoughts about pressure.
articles.title: England v Senegal: Thomas Tuchel tells team to play with a smile at City Ground

articles.description: Britain's Sonay Kartal secures the biggest win of her career as women's tennis returns to Queen's Club for the first time since 1973.
articles.title: Queen's 2025: Sonay Kartal beats Daria Kasatkina as Queen's hosts women's tournament for first time in half a century

articles.description: Motherwell midfielder Lennon Miller put in an eye-catching display as the 18-year-old started his first Scotland game against Liechtenstein.
articles.title: Scotland: Miller shows 'maturity' and 'exceptional' talent

articles.description: Nicholas Pooran, one of the world's leading T20 batters, retires from international duty with West Indies aged 29.
articles.title: Nicholas Pooran: West Indies batter retires from international cricket

articles.description: Manchester City complete the signing of Wolves left-back Rayan Ait-Nouri for £31m.
articles.title: Rayan Ait-Nouri: Manchester City sign Algerian defender from Wolves for £31m

articles.description: After Women's Super League average attendances dropped by 10% last season, BBC Sport has taken a closer look at what might be behind the numbers.
articles.title: WSL attendances: What's going on with falling numbers in 2024-25?

articles.description: The former Wigan player will be the first rugby league player to receive a knighthood in 130 years of the sport's history.
articles.title: Billy Boston to become first ever rugby league knight

articles.description: Cristian Chivu leaves Parma after only 13 games in charge to replace Simone Inzaghi as Inter Milan manager.
articles.title: Christian Chivu: Inter appoint Parma manager
